Text: I really appreciate your regular uploads of this program. I can never catch it live and you are the only source for the torrent. Keep up the great work!

Hey Anon, I also wanted to express my appreciation! It's not always possible to catch GPS when it airs, and it's great to be able to go back when I miss something in the conversation. 

I hope you continue the uploads!
One of the smartest shows around, too bad we cant get it weekly here as I can never catch it on Sundays.
